alert.note: Alert for Androscoggin; Interior Cumberland Highlands; Northern Oxford; Southern Oxford (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 13 at 8:18PM EST by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...An area of heavy snow showers will affect southern Oxford and southwestern Androscoggin Counties... At 814 PM EST...An area of heavy snow showers was near Bethel... moving south AT 25 MPH. Locations impacted include... Mechanic Falls, Bethel, Rumford, Waterford, Grafton, Harrison, Buckfield, Hebron, Lovell, Greenwood, Hanover, Gilead, West Paris, Otisfield, Woodstock, Stoneham, Poland, Riley, Oxford and Albany. This also includes... Speckled Mountain, Old Speck Mountain, Grafton Notch, Evans Notch, and Caribou Mountain. * Visibilities will drop quickly to less than a half mile in this area of heavy snow showers. * Up to a quick inch of snow is possible in this area of heavy snow showers. Travel is not advised during these heavy snow showers. Rapid visibility reduction and potentially icy roads are likely to lead to accidents. Consider delaying travel until the snow showers pass your location. If traveling pull off to a safe location.

area.areaDesc: Androscoggin; Interior Cumberland Highlands; Northern Oxford; Southern Oxford
